original_title: Remembrance of a Summer from an Etobicoke Hotel
overview: An entry in an ongoing video and film series.  An experiment in space and memory.  Remembrance of a Summer from an Etobicoke Hotel was shot on a Samsung Galaxy S10 and Braun Nizo 156 XL super 8 camera using Kodak 7213, 7266, and 7294 film stocks.
title: Remembrance of a Summer from an Etobicoke Hotel
